name: Phasor-learninggame
tagline: Learning Phaser.js, going to stick with javascript with this, but TypeScript looks promising!
body:
### Welcome to JmdJR's First Phaser Game!

This page will update periodically as I make some progress on a sample game using the Phaser.js Game Engine.  

### Demo Section
Here will be the Canvas based game, I don't know what I want to do at this point... maybe make a simple side scrolling platformer... a minimum viable product example.  Wish me luck!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
